channel.title: Palampur on Travel
channel.description: Recent content in Palampur on Travel

item.title: Palampur Chronicles: Tea Gardens and Ancient Temples
item.description:
Temples, Tea Estates, and Tranquil Gardens

Day 3 was dedicated to exploring the cultural and natural beauty around Dharamshala, with a special focus on Palampur - a charming town that perfectly blends agricultural heritage with ancient spirituality.

item.title: Dharamshala - McLeod Ganj - Palampur - Kareri Complete Itinerary
item.description: *The serene beauty of D— title: “My Dharamshala Journey: 6 Days Chasing Mountain Air from Gurgaon” date: 2025-01-15T11:00:00+05:30 slug: /dharamshala-mountain-escape-gurgaon description: “A personal account of my 6-day escape from Gurgaon to Dharamshala - exploring Thehr, McLeodganj, Palampur, and Kareri with mountain vibes and spiritual experiences.” image: /images/dharmshala/dharamshala-journey-hero.jpg caption: “The peaceful mountain roads of Dharamshala - a refreshing escape from Gurgaon’s chaos” categories:
